DOC.brief_summary: This study design randomize , single blind ( data evaluation ) , placebo control , full cross-over study conduct 166 ( include 10 % drop ) males female , age ≥ 18 ≤ 65 waist circumference > 80 cm woman > 94 cm men ( indicate increase risk metabolic complication ( WHO ) ) sedentary lifestyle . Subjects receive rice tea extract rice without tea extract . There three visit test facility : one screen visit two intervention visit . During intervention visit venous blood sample collect analysis plasma glucose ( = -30m , -5m , 15m , 30m , 45m , 1h , 1h 30m , 2h 3h , relative start rice consumption ) serum insulin ( = -5m , 30m , 1h , 2h 3h ) . Between two intervention visit subject interval one week . This interval require minimize subject discomfort repeat blood sampling .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Tea Extract Post Prandial Blood Glucose
DOC.criteria: Waist circumference > 80 cm woman > 94 cm men ; Apparently healthy : medical condition might affect study measurement , absorption , metabolism distribution ( include diabetes type 1 type 2 , gastrointestinal dysfunction , gastrointestinal surgery inflammatory disease ) ; Fasting blood glucose value subject ≥ 3.4 < 6.1 mmol/litre ( i.e . 62 110 mg/dl ) screening ; Being physically inactive ( mean less five time 30 minute moderate activity per week , less three time 20 minute vigorous activity per week , equivalent ) ; Use antibiotic within 3 month first intake test product ; Use medication except paracetamol , within 14 day first intake test product ; Consumption > 14 unit ( female subject ) > 21 unit ( male subject ) alcoholic drink typical week ; Dislike , know allergy intolerance treatment food product provide study .
